column1: ising an increase in the use of military force in the east of the country, to include the use of more advanced Russian artillery and anti-tank missiles. But the UK and Germany have yet to agree on how to use military force in the region, which has seen a significant increase in Russian military activity. EU states have agreed to send a total of 1,000 more tanks to Ukraine by the end of the year. The first batch was ordered for deliveries to eastern Ukraine in May 2013. In March, a Ukrainian court agreed to the transfer of 1,000 more armoured trucks and armoured personnel carriers to Ukraine. The second batch will be set to take to the streets in Kiev in March 2014.
